text:
Any datatype different from xs:string and xs:normamized string should have its
whitespaces collapsed and:

<any xsi:type="xs:Name">
    xxxxxx
</any>

should validate (the value is a valid xs:Name after the whitespaces have been
collapsed).

Thanks

Eric
